description: Tourism sectors "hardest hit" by coronavirus in Guernsey will continue to get States funding.
title: Coronavirus: Financial support extended for Guernsey businesses
title_page: Coronavirus: Financial support extended for Guernsey businesses - BBC News
maintext: Mr Trott said: "The support we've been able to provide so far has gone a long way to keeping many businesses viable during this terrible time, and it's very encouraging to see them beginning to trade again.
